2+1.sig_info: When Nick would be knocked out, his Life Model Decoy is destroyed instead and he returns to the fight with a permanent Fury’s Fury Buff and Stun Immunity. However, Nick loses his Infinity Formula and begins taking Direct Damage equal to 5 to 3.3% of his health per second for the rest of the quest while above 30% max health. The destruction of Nick’s decoy Removes all Effects and isn't affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.
